Ukraine downs 17 out of 22 Russia-launched drones, air force saysUkrainian air defence systems shot down 17 out of 22 Russian drones over nine Ukrainian regions in an attack that caused a fire in a residential building in the early hours of Monday, officials said. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 08:20:48 GMT 3CZ7DDI7MVN5FIM2QBORBZQLEI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-downs-17-out-22-Russia-launched-drones-air-force-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel to offer six-week Gaza truce for 40 hostages in Qatar talks, Israeli official saysIsrael will send a high-level delegation headed by its Mossad chief to Qatar on Monday for mediated talks with Hamas designed to secure a six-week Gaza truce under which the Palestinian militants would free 40 hostages, an Israeli official said. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 08:15:10 GMT FDRVLK467NOTNKUCJJ2ON5MS2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-offers-six-week-gaza-truce-40-hostages-qatar-talks-israeli-official-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东地区
Shock and confusion as Turkey seizes earthquake survivors' homesHabip Yapar felt lucky that his home in southern Turkey withstood last year's devastating earthquake. Then a text message appeared on his phone in October telling him the government was taking ownership of the apartment. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:34:52 GMT UICABIVS3VMUXOPQHIYRM5I2FY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/shock-confusion-turkey-seizes-earthquake-survivors-homes-2024-03-18/Ceyda Caglayan, Burcu Karakas世界中东地区
Malaysia's former PM Mahathir discharged from hospital after infectionMalaysia's former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad was discharged from hospital on Monday nearly three months after he was admitted for an infection, his office said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:29:18 GMT 3NPAZ47TXFJRBM4TKNEZW4XQPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-former-pm-mahathir-discharged-from-hospital-after-infection-2024-03-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taliban says eight killed in Pakistan's two air strikes in AfghanistanAfghanistan's Taliban said on Monday that Pakistan carried out two air strikes in Afghan territory, killing five women and three children, with a spokesman condemning the strikes as a violation of sovereignty. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:06:12 GMT DJ6AS45E6NNVJMRYAGGYKG57TI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-carried-out-two-air-strikes-inside-afghanistan-killed-8-people-taliban-2024-03-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
More Chinese tied the knot in 2023, lifting marriage rates for first time in nine yearsThe number of new marriages in China jumped 12.4% in 2023 from a year earlier, reversing a downtrend that has lasted for almost a decade as more youth tied the knot after delaying their nuptials due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:04:54 GMT 6CVFAPMZQNMD5BTZ4GRPWJI5LA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/more-chinese-tied-knot-2023-lifting-marriage-rates-first-time-nine-years-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中国
China considers taking part in Swiss Ukraine peace talks, ambassador saysChina will consider taking part in a peace conference aimed at ending the war in Ukraine which neutral Switzerland plans to host in the coming months, the Asian country's ambassador to Bern was quoted as saying on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:03:16 GMT CC3YS42AVBOD3KZXNKHFQ34QKY https://www.reuters.com/world/china-considers-takeing-part-swiss-ukraine-peace-talks-ambassador-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界
Nine arrested after Paris suburban police station attackedNine people were arrested after a police station in the Paris suburb of La Courneuve was attacked late on Sunday evening following clashes between youths and police forces, the head of the Paris police said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:01:29 GMT E4CHZLMCCVMRVNE3FUSZJ3JNK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/nine-arrested-after-attack-of-paris-suburban-police-station-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli troops raid Gaza's Shifa HospitalIsraeli troops raided the compound of Gaza's Al-Shifa Hospital early on Monday in an operation that Palestinian health authorities said had caused multiple casualties and set off a fierce fire in one of the buildings. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:42:16 GMT 2SH5SPIPNJIVFOR4JJ7DAUMUMUM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-says-troops-raid-gaza-shifa-hospital-2024-03-18/Reuters世界中东地区
China warns citizens in Singapore to stay away from gamblingChina's embassy in Singapore on Monday urged its citizens in the city-state to stay away from all forms of betting, saying gambling overseas violates Chinese laws. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 04:45:04 GMT G46PNZ5P6RKMLNT7ECV图https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-warns-singapore-citizens-stay-away-gambling-2024-03-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea hosted summit warns of AI risks to democracySouth Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol on Monday called fake news and disinformation based on AI and digital technology threats to democracy, as some officials attending a global summit accused Russia and China of conducting malicious propaganda campaigns. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 03:59:50 GMT A3ZKXGORTZNGLHZPTG2QKIZ5I4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-yoon-warns-tech-threat-democracy-summit-2024-03-18/Ju-Min Park, Jack Kim技术网络安全
